subject: Steroids
Perjury
Doping (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Segui testified for the prosecution in the Roger Clemens perjury trial and recalled a telephone conversation with Brian McNamee 11 years ago about saving evidence.
snippet: David Segui testified for the prosecution in the Roger Clemens perjury trial and recalled a telephone conversation with Brian McNamee 11 years ago about saving evidence.
